tool_description: Creates a new incident investigation case with initial details, assigns unique incident ID, and establishes basic incident parameters for tracking and reference.

incident_date.description: Date and time when the incident occurred

location.description: Specific location where the incident occurred

reporter_name.description: Name of the person reporting the incident

incident_type.description: Category of incident: injury, near_miss, property_damage, environmental, security

brief_description.description: Initial brief description of what happened

error_messages: Invalid incident date: Date must be in valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Invalid incident type: Must be one of [injury, near_miss, property_damage, environmental, security].
Missing required information: All fields (incident_date, location, reporter_name, incident_type, brief_description) must be provided.
Location too vague: Provide specific location details for proper investigation scope.
usage: Provide incident_date, location, reporter_name, incident_type, and brief_description to create a new investigation case. The tool generates a unique incident ID and initializes the investigation record.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier assigned to this incident case

creation_timestamp.description: When the incident record was created
